title: Ramp Bike Jumping
description: Perform the most unimaginable stunts on motorcycles, bicycles, even skis! There’s no backbone to be broken here! And we know a guy who knows a guy, whose sister-in-law bent some laws of physics for us. That’s right, you can get really crazy with our game. So buckle up, or not... It doesn’t matter. The only thing that matters is pure fun and madness!! YEE-HAW!
instructions: Use the left mouse button to launch and use boost in flight!

title: Solitaire Match
description: Let's develop the village by accumulating coins in Solitaire. When you match cards to make a total of 10, the cards will disappear, earning you coins. Continue removing cards until there are no more matching combinations, and clear the stage by achieving the coin quota. If the quota is not achieved and the slots become full, it's a failure. Earn more coins by matching combinations with a greater number of cards or by continuously matching cards in a short amount of time.
instructions: Tap a card to add it to your hand.

title: Soft Girls Winter Aesthetics
description: Hop on a plane and spend your winter vacation traveling around the world together with your favorite princesses. Discover fun winter activities and practice your fashion advisor skills while helping them choose their outfits of the day in the Soft Girls Winter Aesthetics for girls! Have a blast!
instructions: Use your mouse to browse through the category options and dress up the girls.

title: Garden Tales Mahjong 2
description: Welcome to the second instalment of the popular Mahjong game that combines Solitaire Mahjong gameplay with the beautiful theme of the legendary Garden Tales match 3 game. Garden Tales Mahjong 2 features incredible 250+ puzzle layouts, 'Quick Play' mode for instant action, 'Chapters Mode' to unlock new puzzles. The more puzzles you complete the more puzzles you unlock. Enjoy this captivating journey and start your Garden Tales Mahjong adventure today!
instructions: Dive into Garden Tales Mahjong 2 where matching garden-themed tiles blooms fun. Did you get stuck? Use Shuffle, Torch, or Hint to advance through chapters with beautiful garden backdrops, unlocking more as you go. Quick Play offers endless puzzles for quick enjoyment. Clear boards, boost scores, and enjoy a strategic escape in this enchanting sequel. Start your Garden-Tales-themed adventure now!

title: Rescue Rift
description: Embark on a heart-pounding mission in "Rescue Rift," an intense and immersive action-adventure game that challenges your tactical skills and courage. As an elite operative of an undercover rescue team, you find yourself thrust into the depths of danger as you attempt to save hostages who have been kidnapped and confined within the eerie confines of an old, abandoned hospital.
instructions: - Arrow/ WASD to Move - Left mouse button to shoot - Right mouse button for scope - Scroll to change Weapon - E to Rescue

title: Ninja Climb
description: Embark on a thrilling ascent in Ninja Climb, a captivating 2D game where your nimble ninja scales towering buildings. Click to seamlessly leap between structures, dodging obstacles along the way, and utilize rewarded video ads to revive when challenges arise, ensuring an adrenaline-packed ninja adventure.
instructions: Climb to new heights in Ninja Climb, a 2D game where quick clicks propel your ninja between buildings, avoiding obstacles, and use rewarded video ads for strategic revivals.

title: Pet Salon 2
description: Take care of the cutest puppy and cat that you can bathe, help it when it is sick and choose an outfit and dress it up! Pet Salon 2 is very helpful for the daycare of your pet and have too much fun with this game.
instructions: Take care of the cutest puppy and cat that you can bathe, help it when it is sick and choose an outfit and dress it up!

title: Clean The Ocean
description: Pick up waste, clean up oil spills and heal the oceans bit by bit! Venture out on your own boat, clear out parts of the sea and make sure you recycle everything properly. This game is the perfect way to teach kids about ecology and recycling, or just to pass the time in a mindful way. Level up the ship and leave a lasting legacy on planet Earth.
instructions: Use the mouse or touchscreen to navigate the seas. Stop over in areas where you see trash to pick it up, and then travel back to your seaport. The wharf has a recycling point where you can sort out the litter you picked up during your voyage out on the water. Sort the items, starting from the top-left bin and ending at the bottom-right bin. Then use the collected money to purchase upgrades for your ship! You can for example increase the ship’s speed and carrying capacity.

title: Chicken Wars Merge Guns
description: The lands of the chickens are under attack. They are trying to defend themselves with their guns. Help them! It is a tower defense game in which you merge chickens and create more powerful chickens to defend your lands. The enemy will come over you wave by wave. Make sure they don't break your defense.
instructions: Use "MOUSE" and "LEFT-CLICK" to interact with the buttons. Don't forget to make updates during the battle. You can also take some power-ups to strengthen your defense.

title: Tile Match Connect 3 Tiles
description: You have to tap and match all the tiles to clear the playing field before the timer expires. It can help you focus and hone your skills to think and react quickly. Go to the unearthly world and become a master of the match 3 game genre! Enjoy this mahjong tile matching game and enjoy moments of peace during the day to calm your mind and recharge your brain. Sharpen your mind with a series of tile matching levels that gradually increase the difficulty of the puzzle. Relax and enjoy the beautiful scenery backgrounds and use your creativity to decorate your own zen room to relax! Let matching tiles become your new hobby for a relaxed creative mind. Come back to it every day, as there are always new daily mahjong puzzles that allow you to take care of your own houseplant and become a mahjong master!
instructions: ? Find three identical tiles and just click on them to stack them at the very bottom of the playing field. As soon as you find three identical cards, they will be removed from the stack, making room for your new combinations. ? If you cleared the entire playing field in the game "three in a row", you won. If you failed to make a single combination in the stack, you lost. Therefore, do not allow more than seven tiles without combinations to be in your stack at the same time. Control: LMB/Touch

title: Merge Master Skibidi Bop
description: Discover the fantasy world of Skibidi monsters in the Merge Master: Skibidi Bop! Merge your terrible monsters, make them evolve, and have the most powerful army. You need to use your tactics and your brain to combine monsters and fight the Skibidi toilet! You need to evolve your monsters quickly and have a strong army! If you want to win this battle, you need to evolve your monster quickly to get a huge army! Come on!
instructions: Click monster buttons to buy monsters, drag the same monsters to merge them, and get a higher-level monster

title: Granny Pills - Defend Cactuses
description: 2075 year. After the invasion of aliens, there was almost no life and oxygen left on Earth. The only plant that survived are cacti. The aliens want to destroy or steal all the cactuses to stop the live on Earth. The brave Granny who grows her cactuses on the road (so that they can receive rays of light) should protect them from aliens. She discovered that the aliens are afraid of human pills, and she has a huge amount of them, as well as a shotgun loaded in case of emergency.
instructions: Click & Hold to aim. Release to throw the pill. Match the color of the pill with monster's color to destroy it. Protect your cacti and survive as long as possible!

title: Sniper vs Sniper
description: Sniper vs. Sniper is a game where players compete in sniper shooting skills. Each player takes on the role of a sniper, participating in intense battles with an opponent. Exciting long-distance sniper duels where key skills include accuracy, strategy, and quick reaction.
instructions: WASD - Walk Space - Jump Left mouse button - Shoot Right mouse button - Aim

title: Tanks. Race for survival
description: In this exciting tank game, you compete with other players to be the first to reach the finish line, destroying enemy towers along your way. Control powerful tanks, use tactical thinking and strategic maneuvers to overcome obstacles and defeat opponents. Carefully plan your route, avoiding enemy attacks and traps on the path to victory. The thrilling survival race begins here!
instructions: Mouse: left button Touchpad

title: Boxing Gang Stars
description: The stars are in the boxing ring and it is time to fight! These funny boxing characters are trying to destroy each other either in 1 player or in 2 player mode. Start this boxing competition and become the king of the boxing rings! Super fun physics with fun characters is waiting for you! Let the box fights begin!
instructions: Player 1: Move: "W, A, S, D" or "ARROW KEYS"(1P Mode only) Punch: "F, G, T" Block: "E" Player 2: Move: "ARROW KEYS" Punch: "K, L, O" Block: "I"

title: 2248 Musical
description: Once you start playing it, you will absolutely get addicted to these 2048 puzzle games. designed with beautiful graphics and intuitive gameplay, making it a great choice for those who love number block puzzle games
instructions: Connect the tiles to double the number and continue as long as you can to get the highest number you get :) and enjoy the sounds you make by connecting each one.

title: Pet Salon
description: Take care of the cutest pets that you can bathe, and bring to the doctor! Pet Salon is very helpful for the daycare of your pet and have too much fun with this game.
instructions: Take care of the cutest pets that you can bathe, and bring to the doctor

title: Spaces Solitaire
description: Use spaces to arrange all cards in suit and in sequence from 2 to King. You can move a card to a space or empty spot if it is the same color and 1 higher in value than the card to the left of the space.
instructions: The full pack of cards is dealt to the card table, into four rows of cards. Each row has a single space. Your task is to rearrange the cards so they form a correctly ascending sequence of cards, one suit in each row. The catch, you can only move cards into the empty spaces if the card to the left of the empty space is of the same suit and of lower face value.

title: Gun Rush
description: What will you choose? Ak47, bat, duck, pistol, RPG or cat? Dodge obstacles, assemble your team, choose your weapon, and defeat everyone in your path!
instructions: The goal is to reach the coveted chest of gold. Simple, intuitive control with the arrow keys or wasd/ keys.

title: Retro Street Fighter
description: Travel back in time with Retro Street Fighter, a side-scrolling fighting game that will make you feel nostalgic. This game features 2D-pixel art that gives it a classic look. You will fight your way through multiple levels, facing different enemies and showing off your skills. You can choose from seven levels of difficulty and challenge yourself. You will also have various moves to use in combat, such as punches, kicks, and blocks. But be careful, some enemies are tough and dangerous.
instructions: On PC, Arrow keys = move, J = punch, I = kick, K = jump, L = block. On Mobile, Drag the move wheel, Tap the buttons to attack or defend.

title: Yes or No Challenge Run
description: This time you will not only run over the platforms and pass through the gates for the next version of yours, but you will also answer questions and earn rewards. Yes or No Challenge Run game comes with lots of features, surprises, and cool questions! Some helper machines or pets will be with you during this adventure. You can embark on this Yes or No adventure either single-player or 2 player. Pick your game mode and let the adventure start!
instructions: Player 1: Move/Pick answer: "A, D" You can also use "MOUSE" and "LEFT-CLICK" to interact. Player 2: Move/Pick answer: "LEFT-RIGHT ARROWS" You can also use "MOUSE" and "LEFT-CLICK" to interact.

title: Thrill Roller Coaster
description: Thrill Roller Coaster is a fun 3D roller coaster simulator game. Press and hold to accelerate forward, your speed and acceleration is fast enough for you to reach the other end of the track. Watch out for the brakes in the middle and drive the roller coaster at breakneck speeds now! Experience speed and passion!
instructions: Hold to move

title: Vega Mix: Fairy town
description: Join a girl named Vika and the mayor of a magical city in their quest to bring back the holiday spirit and ensure a successful New Year! Play challenging match 3 levels by connecting elements and solving puzzles to overcome various obstacles and help the mayor overcome problems.
instructions: Match 3 or more pieces in a line to explode them. Match 4 pieces to create the Rocket. The Rocket blows up the whole line! Match 4 pieces to form a square to create the Spinner. The Spinner destroys one of the targets! Make a T-shaped match of 5 pieces to create the Bomb. The Bomb makes a massive explosion on the board! Match 5 pieces in a line to create the Rainbow Flower. The Rainbow Flower explodes pieces of the same color!

title: MR RACER - Car Racing
description: MR RACER - Car Racing is a thrilling and challenging racing game that will excite you! Race at high speed with stunning supercars and beat the traffic. This game provides a very easy-to-control car movement and is extremely fun to race.
instructions: W / up arrow key = accelerate A / left arrow key = steer left D / right arrow key = steer right S / down arrow key = brake H = horn

title: Parkour World 2
description: Welcome to Parkour World 2, an exhilarating Minecraft-inspired parkour game with thrilling challenges and delightful gameplay. -Each level in this game boasts its own distinct and features, ensuring a fresh and exciting experience every time you play. -While the initial levels may seem relatively simple, as you progress through the game. By the time you conquer the first ten levels, you'll find yourself facing increasingly demanding obstacles. -Get ready to run, and conquer in Parkour World!
instructions: WASD to Move Shift to Run Space to Jump ESC to Pause/Resume E to Open Chest

title: Fish Story 3
description: Welcome to Fish Story 3! Immerse yourself in 4,000+ levels of Match 3 excitement guided by our mermaid host. Solve puzzles, conquer Daily Missions, and unlock treasures in the Daily Challenge. Dive into addictive challenges and return daily for rewards. Join the underwater adventure now!
instructions: Match at least 3 of the same undersea items to get all the stars. Match more than 4 of the same colour and you will collect additional power-ups and boosters! So what are you waiting for? Play and enjoy the incredible Fish Story 3 now for free!

title: Mahjong At Home - Scandinavian Edition
description: Immerse yourself in the minimalist elegance of the North with 'Mahjong at Home: Scandinavian Winter Edition'. This high-quality Mahjong game celebrates the sleek, modern design of Scandinavian style, blending festive themes with clean, sophisticated aesthetics for a uniquely cozy winter gaming experience.
instructions: Click to match same kind of tiles until you clear the board.

title: Animation & Coloring Alphabet Lore
description: Learn and draw the Alphabet with Animation & Coloring Alphabet Lore, a fun and educational simulation game. You will discover the secrets of each letter before you bring it to life with your own colors and creativity. You can choose from sixteen letters and Free Draw mode to unleash your imagination. You can also use different tools and colors to make your drawings more amazing. There is no time limit or score in this game, just relax and enjoy the art of drawing!
instructions: Mouse to select tools and draw

title: Alphabet Merge and Fight
description: Evolution Merge games that you like! Monsters from all over the universe are alive! Drag and combine letter monsters in the mutant fighting simulator. Play and explore Alphabet Letras workshop and adventure games! Monsters from other universes have joined the alphabet kitchen to fight in evolution games! Play in 3D as one of your favorite characters from the collection.
instructions: PC Control: WASD/ Arrows Control on a mobile device: pile - Move the letter of the alphabet. - Unlock new units and put them on the board. - Drag and match two identical units to create a completely new character. - Press "Start" to start the battle and defeat the enemies.

title: Crowd Battle Gun Rush
description: Crowd Battle Gun Rush is a weapon evolution history parkour game. At the beginning of the game, you only have an ax, which is the least lethal weapon. You must keep moving forward. On the way forward, you must collect bundles of money. , which can be used to purchase weapons and ammunition. When you prepare your weapons, you can target the groups that remain and continue to attack and eliminate them.
instructions: Slide to move

title: Gun Fest
description: Gun Fest is a free online shooting game for boys played on PuzzleGame. Of course, a lot of running elements are added to the game. In the process of playing, you not only have to choose the right door to fight against the enemy but also have to avoid many obstacles to reach the end. It will greatly test your skills and reaction ability. Play on Mobile, Tablet, or Desktop with us!
instructions: Mouse or tap to play

title: Princess Valentines Crush
description: Welcome to Princess Valentine’s Crush game. Princess Elsa has a crush on Jack Frost. She Invited Jack to the valentine’s party. Both have a plan to do some makeovers and enjoy taking some photos to post on social media. Join and help the beautiful couples. Have fun!
instructions: Left Mouse Button Click

title: Island Battle 3D
description: Jump and survive in Island Battle 3D, a 3D IO game that will keep you on your toes. You will play as a jumper who must avoid falling off the island. You will also have to knock back your enemies and be the last one standing. You will face a strategic challenge, as the island’s surface is constantly breaking and changing. You can use this to your advantage and push your rivals into the gaps. But watch out, they can do the same to you.
instructions: On PC WASD = move Space = jump On Mobile Tap the buttons or swipe wheels on the screen

title: Mind Games for 2-3-4 Player
description: Mind Games is a huge game where you can find 2-3-4 player games while playing. The game consists of 27 games under various categories like skill games, Brain Games, matching games, pop-it games, mancala, ludo, and Tic Tac Toe games. Each of these games is fun and made for kids and it is safe to play. Most of these games can be played 2 player, 3 player or 4 player.
instructions: Use "MOUSE" and "LEFT-CLICK" in turn.

title: Block Color Puzzle Blast
description: Immerse yourself in the explosive fun of Block Color Puzzle Blast, a thrilling puzzler where strategic block placement is key. Drag and drop vibrant blocks to fill gaps, unleash combos to earn massive scores, and experience the satisfying blast as completed lines clear the board, challenging you to reach new heights in colorful puzzle mastery.
instructions: Challenge your strategic prowess in Block Color Puzzle Blast as you drag and drop vibrant blocks, create explosive combos, and enjoy the satisfying blast of cleared lines in this addictive puzzle experience.

title: Gin Rummy
description: "Gin Rummy" is a classic and engaging card game where the goal is to strategically arrange your hand into sets and runs. Place your cards in either groups of the same rank or in sequential order of the same suit. Score points by eliminating these combinations from your hand. The game ends when a player reaches the target score, typically set at 100 points.
instructions: Never played Gin Rummy before? Essentially, the goal of Gin Rummy is to have less deadwood than your opponent, or ideally, no deadwood at all. Your deadwood amount becomes your opponent's points. If your opponent's points exceed 100, you lose. Conversely, if you reach 100 points before your opponent, you win.

title: Giant Sushi Merge Master Game
description: Giant Sushi is a relaxing puzzle game where your goal is to merge sushi! Sounds easy, doesn't it? Take the challenge and become the new sushi master!
instructions: Drag & Drop identical sushi to create new, larger sushi.

title: Dragon Year Jigsaw
description: Dive into the lively universe of 'Dragon Year Jigsaw,' a comical online puzzle game set in the Chinese Dragon Year. Solve 24 levels of dragon-themed jigsaw puzzles, featuring vibrant and playful comic art. Perfect for puzzle lovers and those seeking a whimsical online experience. Join the fun – start piecing together your dragon adventure now!
instructions: Use your mouse or touch screen to drag and drop pieces into place. Piece together whimsical dragon-themed images across 24 levels. It's that simple – just drag, drop, and have fun unraveling the comical world of jigsaw puzzles!

title: Solitaire Mahjong Farm 2
description: Welcome to "Solitaire Mahjong Farm 2," the sequel with more fun! Featuring Quick Play for random layouts and Chapter Division for structured progression. Complete chapters to unlock new ones, each filled with unique puzzles. A new shuffle mechanism solves tricky tile pairs, enhancing gameplay. Perfect for strategic minds seeking engaging, themed challenges. Join now and continue your Mahjong farm adventure!
instructions: Dive into "Solitaire Mahjong Farm 2" and pair up farm-themed tiles, making sure they're free. Need a push? Use the new Shuffle for tricky moments or boosters like Torch and Hint. Progress through chapters by completing layouts to unlock the next, all set against delightful farm backdrops. Quick Play provides randomized layouts for endless fun. Clear the board and watch your score rise. Get ready for a strategic, farm-themed brain teaser. Play now to sharpen your mind in this engaging sequel!

title: Black Jump
description: Escape the war-torn planet in this dynamic jump-and-run game. Sprint through the desolate landscape, vanquish enemies, sidestep deadly traps, and gather valuable crystals.
instructions: Click to jump side to side, evade obstacles, and gather crystals. Utilize the crystals to acquire powerful upgrades.

title: Dream Wedding Planner
description: Plan your dream wedding with Dream Wedding Planner Game, a simulation game for kids and girls who love weddings. You can pick four characters and plan six different aspects of their wedding. You can use various tools to complete each step and create your own style. You can skip the current scene by following the pink arrow on top. You can also print the screen after each step and change your plan as you wish. You can make different design plans for each character and give them a sweet wedding.
instructions: On PC and Mobile Tap to select Drag to move items or tools

title: Z Stick Duel Fighting
description: Join the ultimate stickman battle in Z Stick Duel Fighting, a game that will make you fight for glory. You will play as a stickman warrior who must face other stickmen from across the universe. Can you win this duel competition? Various exciting and handsome skills are waiting for you to try! Calculate the amount of mana, avoid the enemy's attacks, and deliver a fatal blow! You are the stickman fighting king of the universe!
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Three Chickens
description: Hurry up! The chickens are coming home to roost. Drag and drop the chicken into the tiles to match them. Match 3 or more chickens to eliminate them. How high can you score in this endless match 3 game?
instructions: Match three chickens or more

title: Super Soccer Noggins
description: Select your preferred nation and guide them to triumph in the wildest soccer competitions. Experience 10 unique powerups and numerous diverse fields, each adding a distinct, whimsical touch to every game. Can you conquer all 6 trophies in this exhilarating soccer adventure?
instructions: Use the cursor keys and the space bar

title: Dino Shooter Pro
description: Dino Shooter Pro is an exciting gun battle game. You are on an island. There are many dinosaurs and bad guys on this island. They are extremely ferocious and attack everyone they see. Your weapon is a gun. When there are dinosaurs and bad guys around you, pick up your gun, aim at the opponent, and fire bullets in rapid succession. Try to kill all of them, good luck!
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Lucy All Season Fashioninsta
description: "Lucy All Season Fashionista" invites you to four seasonal clothing adventures! From spring to winter, create combinations that cover every season. Experience the freedom to create your own style by complementing Lucy's fashion with accessories. This fun and heartfelt game is ideal for anyone who is interested in fashion!
instructions: LEFT CLICK Touch for mobile.

title: L.O.L. Surprise! O.M.G. B.B. Driver
description: Help Neonlicious collect gifts for her friends, but watch out for the roadworks and other obstacles in L.O.L. Surprise! O.M.G.™ B.B. Driver. Keep an eye on your battery level! It depletes more quickly if you hit patches of bad road, but you can recharge by driving over the blue arrows. Upgrade your car, unlock music tapes with official L.O.L. O.M.G. tunes, and make your way through the gift-filled levels.
instructions: Use the arrow keys or touch screen to move the car across the three lanes. Dodge the obstacles blocking the road while picking up gifts for your favorite dolls! The current level objective is always shown at the top of the screen.

title: Dunk Challenge
description: Shoot and score with Dunk Challenge, a 2D basketball game that will make you bounce with joy. You will play as a basketball shooter. You will also enjoy a new explosive mode that adds more fun and challenge to your gameplay. You will tap the screen to shoot and use your 14 bullets wisely to make the ball rebound and land in the hoop. You will also collect purple diamonds and explore the store, where you can find 15 different ball skins to customize your game. Don’t miss this addictive game!
instructions: Tap the button to shoot

title: Hotel Manager
description: Have you ever dreamt of being one of the biggest landowners in the world? Get your (virtual) chance in this extremely addictive game! Build hotels all over the world, upgrade them and crowd your opponents out of the market, leaving their customers to come to you!
instructions: The aim of this game is to build hotels and bankrupt your opponents. You can play against up to 5 computer opponents or real friends using the same device. Roll the dice to begin - and good luck!

title: Bubble Shooter Valentine
description: "Bubble Shooter Valentine" is a delightful twist on the classic bubble shooter genre, set in a charming Valentine's Day theme. With its vibrant romantic aesthetics, players shoot and match colorful bubbles to create clusters and clear the screen. A perfect treat for bubble game enthusiasts, it offers a love-infused take on the familiar gameplay mechanics, ensuring an enjoyable experience for fans of the genre, particularly those who appreciate the engaging dynamics of Bubble Game 3.
instructions: Click or tap on the spot you would like to shoot the bubble to.
